20110113093902.000|20110113093905.000|CC1|LESS JOYFUL.                    
20110113093905.000|20110113093908.000|CC1|SO OUR HOPE IN THE PRAYER WE ARE
20110113093908.000|20110113093911.000|CC1|SENDING WITH LOVE TO GABBY AND  
20110113093911.000|20110113093913.000|CC1|TO MARK IS THAT GABBY WILL BE   
20110113093913.000|20110113093918.000|CC1|ABLE TO JOIN US, AS WE TAKE ON  
20110113093918.000|20110113093922.000|CC1|THE WORK CUT OUT FOR US, TO     
20110113093922.000|20110113093926.000|CC1|WHICH GABBY, YOU HAVE DEVOTED   
20110113093926.000|20110113093929.000|CC1|YOUR WHOLE SELF SO FULLY.       
20110113093929.000|20110113093933.000|CC1|I YIELD BACK.                   
20110113093933.000|20110113093933.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: THE    
20110113093933.000|20110113093934.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN YIELDS.               
20110113093934.000|20110113093936.000|CC1|THE GENTLEMAN IS RECOGNIZED.    
20110113093936.000|20110113093938.000|CC1|MR. FLAKE: I THANK THE SPEAKER. 
20110113093938.000|20110113093938.000|CC1|LET ME SAY HOW NICE IT IS TO    
20110113093938.000|20110113093942.000|CC1|HAVE YOU PRESIDING, ANOTHER     
20110113093942.000|20110113093943.000|CC1|ARIZONAN CONTROLLING TIME ON    
20110113093943.000|20110113093945.000|CC1|THAT SIDE, AND SO MANY IN THE   
20110113093945.000|20110113093946.000|CC1|DELEGATION HERE TODAY, WE ARE A 
20110113093946.000|20110113093947.000|CC1|CLOSE DELEGATION.               
20110113093947.000|20110113093949.000|CC1|I YIELD SUCH TIME AS HE MAY     
20110113093949.000|20110113093951.000|CC1|CONSUME TO THE GENTLEMAN FROM   
20110113093951.000|20110113093958.000|CC1|ARIZONA, MR. GOSAR.             
20110113093958.000|20110113094001.000|CC1|MR. GOSAR: MR. SPEAKER, I STAND 
20110113094001.000|20110113094003.000|CC1|HERE TODAY WITH A HEAVY HEART AS
20110113094003.000|20110113094005.000|CC1|I GIVE MY PRAYERS TO            
20110113094005.000|20110113094006.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE GIFFORDS AND HER 
20110113094006.000|20110113094008.000|CC1|FAMILY.                         
20110113094008.000|20110113094008.000|CC1|AS WELL AS MY CONDOLENCES TO THE
20110113094008.000|20110113094011.000|CC1|OTHER VICTIMS OF THE RAMPAGE IN 
20110113094011.000|20110113094012.000|CC1|TUCSON.                         
20110113094012.000|20110113094014.000|CC1|I SPEAK NOT JUST FOR MYSELF AND 
20110113094014.000|20110113094016.000|CC1|FOR MY FAMILY, BUT FOR THE      
20110113094016.000|20110113094017.000|CC1|CITIZENS OF MY DISTRICT IN      
20110113094017.000|20110113094019.000|CC1|ARIZONA AND SO MANY OTHERS WHO  
20110113094019.000|20110113094021.000|CC1|ARE SADDENED AND OUTRAGED BY    
20110113094021.000|20110113094023.000|CC1|THIS SENSELESS ACT.             
20110113094023.000|20110113094025.000|CC1|GABBY IS MORE THAN ARIZONA'S    
20110113094025.000|20110113094027.000|CC1|THIRD FEMALE CONGRESSWOMAN.     
20110113094027.000|20110113094029.000|CC1|SHE IS FIRST AND FOREMOST AN    
20110113094029.000|20110113094031.000|CC1|AMERICAN WHO DEVOTED MUCH OF HER
20110113094031.000|20110113094033.000|CC1|LIFE TO PUBLIC SERVICE.         
20110113094033.000|20110113094035.000|CC1|THERE ARE RISKS WITH PUBLIC     
20110113094035.000|20110113094037.000|CC1|SERVICE, WE CANNOT DENY THAT.   
20110113094037.000|20110113094039.000|CC1|BUT GABBY HAS POWERFUL BELIEFS  
20110113094039.000|20110113094040.000|CC1|AND SHE CAME TO D.C. TO         
20110113094040.000|20110113094042.000|CC1|REPRESENT THE PEOPLE OF HER     
20110113094042.000|20110113094043.000|CC1|DISTRICT AND EVERYONE KNOWS SHE 
20110113094043.000|20110113094046.000|CC1|IS TIRELESS.                    
20110113094046.000|20110113094048.000|CC1|GABBY HAS THE GRIT OF A FIGHTER 
20110113094048.000|20110113094049.000|CC1|AND THE TENACITY OF A WOMAN ON A
20110113094049.000|20110113094051.000|CC1|MISSION.                        
20110113094051.000|20110113094052.000|CC1|IT IS THAT HEART AND THAT GRIT  
20110113094052.000|20110113094054.000|CC1|AND THAT TENACITY THAT I PRAY   
20110113094054.000|20110113094056.000|CC1|WILL CONTINUE TO SERVE HER WELL 
20110113094056.000|20110113094058.000|CC1|AND SPEED HER RECOVERY.         
20110113094058.000|20110113094100.000|CC1|I HOPE THE DAY IS COMING SOON   
20110113094100.000|20110113094102.000|CC1|THAT I GET TO GREET GABBY WITH  
20110113094102.000|20110113094103.000|CC1|OPEN ARMS AND WELCOME HER BACK  
20110113094103.000|20110113094106.000|CC1|TO THE FLOOR OF THIS HOUSE.     
20110113094106.000|20110113094108.000|CC1|THERE IS SO MUCH THAT WE HAVE   
20110113094108.000|20110113094111.000|CC1|YET TO DO TOGETHER FOR ARIZONA, 
20110113094111.000|20110113094113.000|CC1|FOR THIS COUNTRY.               
20110113094113.000|20110113094113.000|CC1|I LOOK FORWARD TO WORKING WITH  
20110113094113.000|20110113094116.000|CC1|GABBY ON THE ISSUES OF OUR DAY  
20110113094116.000|20110113094118.000|CC1|AND HEARING HER SPIRITED VOICE. 
20110113094118.000|20110113094121.000|CC1|LET ME ADD FURTHER, THE ACTS OF 
20110113094121.000|20110113094124.000|CC1|A CRIMINAL WILL NOT STOP US FROM
20110113094124.000|20110113094124.000|CC1|MEETING OUR PEOPLE.             
20110113094124.000|20110113094126.000|CC1|WE WILL NOT BE DETERRED.        
20110113094126.000|20110113094128.000|CC1|WE WILL NOT BE INTIMIDATED AND  
20110113094128.000|20110113094129.000|CC1|WE WILL NOT ABANDONED THE PEOPLE
20110113094129.000|20110113094131.000|CC1|OF ARIZONA BECAUSE OF THE       
20110113094131.000|20110113094133.000|CC1|MURDEROUS ACTS OF A DERANGED    
20110113094133.000|20110113094134.000|CC1|KILLER.                         
20110113094134.000|20110113094135.000|CC1|GABBY READ THE FIRST AMENDMENT  
20110113094135.000|20110113094137.000|CC1|ON THE FLOOR OF THE HOUSE JUST  
20110113094137.000|20110113094139.000|CC1|DAYS BEFORE SHE WAS SHOT.       
20110113094139.000|20110113094142.000|CC1|THAT AMENDMENT PROVIDES THAT THE
20110113094142.000|20110113094143.000|CC1|PEOPLE SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO  
20110113094143.000|20110113094144.000|CC1|PETITION THEIR GOVERNMENT AND   
20110113094144.000|20110113094145.000|CC1|GIVE THE PEOPLE OF THIS NATION A
20110113094145.000|20110113094147.000|CC1|VOICE TO SPEAK ON THE ISSUES    
20110113094147.000|20110113094149.000|CC1|IMPORTANT TO THEM.              
20110113094149.000|20110113094150.000|CC1|GABBY DID NOT JUST READ THE     
20110113094150.000|20110113094153.000|CC1|FIRST AMENDMENT, SHE LIVED IT.  
20110113094153.000|20110113094155.000|CC1|SHE WAS LIVING IT ON THE VERY   
20110113094155.000|20110113094159.000|CC1|DAY SOMEONE TRIED TO KILL HER.  
20110113094159.000|20110113094200.000|CC1|LET US CONTINUE TO PRAY FOR THE 
20110113094200.000|20110113094201.000|CC1|RECOVERY OF THE WOUNDED, LET US 
20110113094201.000|20110113094203.000|CC1|PRAY FOR THE FULL RECOVERY OF   
20110113094203.000|20110113094204.000|CC1|GABBY, LET US PRAY FOR THE      
20110113094204.000|20110113094206.000|CC1|FAMILIES WHO LOST A LOVED ONE,  
20110113094206.000|20110113094208.000|CC1|LET US PRAY FOR THE MOTHERS AND 
20110113094208.000|20110113094210.000|CC1|FATHERS WHO LOST A CHILD.       
20110113094210.000|20110113094211.000|CC1|AND LET US PRAY THAT GOD WILL   
20110113094211.000|20110113094213.000|CC1|CONTINUE TO GUIDE US IN         
20110113094213.000|20110113094214.000|CC1|EVERYTHING WE DO.               
20110113094214.000|20110113094216.000|CC1|THANK YOU, MR. SPEAKER, I YIELD 
20110113094216.000|20110113094217.000|CC1|BACK THE BALANCE OF MY TIME.    
20110113094217.000|20110113094219.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: THE    
20110113094219.000|20110113094220.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN YIELDS.               
20110113094220.000|20110113094220.000|CC1|THE GENTLEMAN IS RECOGNIZED.    
20110113094220.000|20110113094221.000|CC1|MR. PASTOR: MR. SPEAKER, I YIELD
20110113094221.000|20110113094224.000|CC1|TWO MINUTES TO THE GENTLEMAN    
20110113094224.000|20110113094228.000|CC1|FROM MICHIGAN.                  
20110113094228.000|20110113094228.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: THE    
20110113094228.000|20110113094234.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN IS RECOGNIZED.        
20110113094234.000|20110113094236.000|CC1|>> MR. SPEAKER, I RISE TODAY TO 
20110113094236.000|20110113094239.000|CC1|HONOR AND OFFER PRAYERS FOR MY  
20110113094239.000|20110113094242.000|CC1|FRIEND AND COLLEAGUE,           
20110113094242.000|20110113094244.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE         
20110113094244.000|20110113094244.000|CC1|GIFFORDS, HER STAFF AND ALL OF  
20110113094244.000|20110113094246.000|CC1|THE VICTIMS OF THE TRAGIC AND   
20110113094246.000|20110113094249.000|CC1|SENSELESS SHOOTING IN TUCSON.   
20110113094249.000|20110113094250.000|CC1|MR. KILDEE: SHE IS A BRILLIANT  
20110113094250.000|20110113094253.000|CC1|AND CARING PUBLIC SERVANT.      
20110113094253.000|20110113094256.000|CC1|SHE LOVES THIS COUNTRY AS ALL   
20110113094256.000|20110113094259.000|CC1|MEMBERS OF CONGRESS DO.         
20110113094259.000|20110113094302.000|CC1|AT TIMES LIKE THESE, WORDS ARE  
20110113094302.000|20110113094303.000|CC1|ALWAYS INADEQUATE TO EXPRESS THE
20110113094303.000|20110113094306.000|CC1|FULL EXTENT OF OUR GRIEF.       
20110113094306.000|20110113094308.000|CC1|WHAT WE CAN DO IS PRAY, REFLECT 
20110113094308.000|20110113094312.000|CC1|AND SEEK TO GAIN SOME MEANINGFUL
20110113094312.000|20110113094313.000|CC1|PERSPECTIVE FROM THIS TIME OF   
20110113094313.000|20110113094316.000|CC1|GREAT SORROW.                   
20110113094316.000|20110113094319.000|CC1|MR. SPEAKER, THIS TERRIBLE ACT, 
20110113094319.000|20110113094323.000|CC1|WHATEVER THE CAUSE, DOES        
20110113094323.000|20110113094325.000|CC1|VIOLENCE TO THE DEMOCRATIC      
20110113094325.000|20110113094326.000|CC1|PRINCIPLES OUR COUNTRY WAS      
20110113094326.000|20110113094328.000|CC1|FOUNDED ON.                     
20110113094328.000|20110113094330.000|CC1|AS I PRAY FOR THE VICTIMS OF    
20110113094330.000|20110113094331.000|CC1|THIS TERRIBLE EVENT, I ALSO PRAY
20110113094331.000|20110113094335.000|CC1|THAT OUR COUNTRY CAN MOVE       
20110113094335.000|20110113094335.000|CC1|FORWARD FROM THIS TRAGEDY WITH  
20110113094335.000|20110113094340.000|CC1|THAT LOVE AND RESPECT THAT      
20110113094340.000|20110113094342.000|CC1|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS HAS FOR HUMAN
20110113094342.000|20110113094343.000|CC1|DIGNITY.                        
20110113094343.000|20110113094344.000|CC1|MR. SPEAKER, I YIELD BACK THE   
20110113094344.000|20110113094349.000|CC1|BALANCE OF MY TIME.             
20110113094349.000|20110113094350.000|CC1|MR. FLAKE: MR. SPEAKER, I YIELD 
20110113094350.000|20110113094351.000|CC1|SUCH TIME AS HE MAY CONSUME TO  
20110113094351.000|20110113094353.000|CC1|THE GENTLEMAN FROM GEORGIA, MR. 
20110113094353.000|20110113094357.000|CC1|PRICE.                          
20110113094357.000|20110113094359.000|CC1|MR. PRICE: THANK YOU, MR.       
20110113094359.000|20110113094400.000|CC1|SPEAKER.                        
20110113094400.000|20110113094402.000|CC1|MR. SPEAKER, TRAGEDY IS ALWAYS  
20110113094402.000|20110113094404.000|CC1|ACCOMPANIED BY SO MANY THOUGHTS 
20110113094404.000|20110113094408.000|CC1|AND EMOTIONS AND THE IRRATIONAL 
20110113094408.000|20110113094408.000|CC1|VIOLENCE VISITED UPON OUR NATION
20110113094408.000|20110113094410.000|CC1|LAST SATURDAY IN TUCSON BROUGHT 
20110113094410.000|20110113094412.000|CC1|A NEW WAVE.                     
20110113094412.000|20110113094414.000|CC1|SHOCK AT LEARNING THE NEWS OF   
20110113094414.000|20110113094417.000|CC1|THE CARNAGE, INCREDULITY AT EVEN
20110113094417.000|20110113094419.000|CC1|THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH A       
20110113094419.000|20110113094421.000|CC1|SENSELESS ACT, SADNESS FOR THOSE
20110113094421.000|20110113094425.000|CC1|INJURED OR KILLED AND FOR THEIR 
20110113094425.000|20110113094428.000|CC1|FAMILIES, CONFUSION BY THIS     
20110113094428.000|20110113094432.000|CC1|INEXPLICABLE VIOLENCE, ANGER AT 
20110113094432.000|20110113094435.000|CC1|THE LUNATIC RESPONSIBLE FOR THIS
20110113094435.000|20110113094437.000|CC1|, INADEQUACY TO COMBREHEND THE  
20110113094437.000|20110113094442.000|CC1|MIND THAT CONCEIVES SUCH AN ACT,
20110113094442.000|20110113094443.000|CC1|RESPECT FOR THOSE EXPERT HANDS  
20110113094443.000|20110113094446.000|CC1|AND MINDS WORKING TO HEAL THE   
20110113094446.000|20110113094449.000|CC1|CASUALTIES, HONOR FOR THOSE WHO 
20110113094449.000|20110113094450.000|CC1|SACRIFICED AND HELPED IN A      
20110113094450.000|20110113094454.000|CC1|MOMENT OF REAL CRISIS, HOPE FOR 
20110113094454.000|20110113094456.000|CC1|A FULL RECOVERY FOR             
20110113094456.000|20110113094458.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE GIFFORDS
20110113094458.000|20110113094502.000|CC1|AND ALL BATTLING THEIR INJURIES,
20110113094502.000|20110113094504.000|CC1|RECOGNITION THAT LIFE AND       
20110113094504.000|20110113094506.000|CC1|LIBERTY ARE PRECIOUS AND        
20110113094506.000|20110113094508.000|CC1|FLEETING, LOVE OF OUR COUNTRY   
20110113094508.000|20110113094509.000|CC1|AND THE BLESSING OF LIBERTY THAT
20110113094509.000|20110113094513.000|CC1|WE ALL ENJOY, STEADFAST IN OUR  
20110113094513.000|20110113094516.000|CC1|COMMITMENT TO PRESERVING OUR    
20110113094516.000|20110113094521.000|CC1|GREAT NATION, HUMBLED BY OUR    
20110113094521.000|20110113094522.000|CC1|MUTUAL RESPONSIBILITY AS        
20110113094522.000|20110113094526.000|CC1|CITIZENS CHARGED WITH THAT      
20110113094526.000|20110113094527.000|CC1|PRESERVATION, REVERENCE FOR OUR 
20110113094527.000|20110113094530.000|CC1|LORD, THE ONLY ONE WHO KNOWS THE
20110113094530.000|20110113094534.000|CC1|ANSWER TO THE WHY, AND STRENGTH 
20110113094534.000|20110113094536.000|CC1|FROM HIS GRACE AND HIS LOVE AND 
20110113094536.000|20110113094537.000|CC1|HIS MERCY.                      
20110113094537.000|20110113094540.000|CC1|AND SO WE RESOLVE TO USE THIS   
20110113094540.000|20110113094542.000|CC1|UNSPEAKABLE AND SENSELESS       
20110113094542.000|20110113094544.000|CC1|TRAGEDY AS AN OPPORTUNITY TO    
20110113094544.000|20110113094547.000|CC1|BETTER OURSELVES AS A PEOPLE, TO
20110113094547.000|20110113094549.000|CC1|RECOMMIT OURSELVES TO THE       
20110113094549.000|20110113094551.000|CC1|TIRELESS PRESERVATION OF OUR    
20110113094551.000|20110113094553.000|CC1|REPUBLIC, AND TO REAFFIRM THOSE 
20110113094553.000|20110113094555.000|CC1|FUNDAMENTAL PRINCIPLES OF       
20110113094555.000|20110113094557.000|CC1|LIBERTY AND AMERICAN            
20110113094557.000|20110113094558.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE GOVERNMENT.      
20110113094558.000|20110113094600.000|CC1|MAY GOD PLACE HIS HEALING HAND  
20110113094600.000|20110113094603.000|CC1|ON ALL AFFECTED BY THIS HEINOUS 
20110113094603.000|20110113094604.000|CC1|EVENT AND MAY GOD BLESS THE     
20110113094604.000|20110113094609.000|CC1|UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.       
20110113094609.000|20110113094610.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: THE    
20110113094610.000|20110113094611.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN YIELDS BACK.          
20110113094611.000|20110113094612.000|CC1|THE GENTLEMAN IS RECOGNIZED.    
20110113094612.000|20110113094613.000|CC1|MR. PASTOR: MR. SPEAKER, AT THIS
20110113094613.000|20110113094614.000|CC1|TIME I WOULD YIELD TWO MINUTES  
20110113094614.000|20110113094618.000|CC1|TO THE GENTLELADY FROM TEXAS.   
20110113094618.000|20110113094619.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: THE    
20110113094619.000|20110113094619.000|CC1|GENTLELADY FROM TEXAS IS        
20110113094619.000|20110113094626.000|CC1|RECOGNIZED.                     
20110113094626.000|20110113094627.000|CC1|MS. JOHNSON: THANK YOU, MR.     
20110113094627.000|20110113094628.000|CC1|SPEAKER.                        
20110113094628.000|20110113094631.000|CC1|I RISE IN STRONG SUPPORT OF THE 
20110113094631.000|20110113094632.000|CC1|RESOLUTION BEFORE US TODAY.     
20110113094632.000|20110113094633.000|CC1|AND THINK IT IS FITTING AND     
20110113094633.000|20110113094636.000|CC1|PROPER THAT WE TAKE THIS        
20110113094636.000|20110113094637.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITY TO PAUSE AND        
20110113094637.000|20110113094639.000|CC1|REMEMBER THOSE WHO LOST THEIR   
20110113094639.000|20110113094642.000|CC1|LIVES AND WERE WOUNDED IN THE   
20110113094642.000|20110113094643.000|CC1|TRAGEDY THAT OCCURRED LAST      
20110113094643.000|20110113094644.000|CC1|SATURDAY IN TUCSON, ARIZONA.    
20110113094644.000|20110113094647.000|CC1|IT IS REALLY HARD TO COMPREHEND 
20110113094647.000|20110113094649.000|CC1|HOW SUCH SENSELESS ACTS OF      
20110113094649.000|20110113094651.000|CC1|VIOLENCE CAN HAPPEN.            
20110113094651.000|20110113094653.000|CC1|AND YET WHILE WE MAY NOT BE ABLE
20110113094653.000|20110113094655.000|CC1|TO FATHOM WHY THIS TRAGEDY      
20110113094655.000|20110113094658.000|CC1|OCCURRED, THE HARSH REALITY IS  
20110113094658.000|20110113094701.000|CC1|THAT SIX INNOCENT PEOPLE WERE   
20110113094701.000|20110113094703.000|CC1|KILLED, INCLUDING A 9-YEAR-OLD  
20110113094703.000|20110113094704.000|CC1|CHILD, AND ANOTHER 14           
20110113094704.000|20110113094707.000|CC1|INDIVIDUALS WERE WOUNDED,       
20110113094707.000|20110113094709.000|CC1|INCLUDING OUR OWN FRIEND AND    
20110113094709.000|20110113094711.000|CC1|COLLEAGUE, REPRESENTATIVE       
20110113094711.000|20110113094712.000|CC1|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS.             
20110113094712.000|20110113094713.000|CC1|AS WE SPEAK, SHE REMAINS IN     
20110113094713.000|20110113094714.000|CC1|CRITICAL CONDITION IN THE       
20110113094714.000|20110113094716.000|CC1|INTENSIVE CARE UNIT AT THE      
20110113094716.000|20110113094719.000|CC1|UNIVERSITY MEDICAL CENTER IN    
20110113094719.000|20110113094720.000|CC1|TUCSON, FIGHTING FOR HER LIFE.  
20110113094720.000|20110113094722.000|CC1|THOSE OF US WHO KNOW GABBY KNOW 
20110113094722.000|20110113094724.000|CC1|THAT SHE IS A REAL FIGHTER AND  
20110113094724.000|20110113094727.000|CC1|THAT GIVES US OPTIMISM THAT THE 
20110113094727.000|20110113094729.000|CC1|FINAL OUTCOME WILL BE A GOOD ONE
20110113094729.000|20110113094732.000|CC1|THAT SHE WILL BE RETURNING TO   
20110113094732.000|20110113094734.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION THAT SHE LOVED 
20110113094734.000|20110113094736.000|CC1|AND STILL FIGHT FOR WHAT SHE    
20110113094736.000|20110113094737.000|CC1|BELIEVES IN.                    
20110113094737.000|20110113094738.000|CC1|A NUMBER OF MY COLLEAGUES HAVE  
20110113094738.000|20110113094741.000|CC1|SPOKEN ABOUT THE MANY WAYS IN   
20110113094741.000|20110113094741.000|CC1|WHICH REPRESENTATIVE GIFFORDS

20110113100315.000|20110113100318.000|CC1|AMENDMENT OF OUR CONSTITUTION,  
20110113100318.000|20110113100322.000|CC1|SHE GAVE HER OWN STRONG         
20110113100322.000|20110113100324.000|CC1|EMPHASIS TO THE PRAISE THAT     
20110113100324.000|20110113100327.000|CC1|GRANTS AMERICANS THE RIGHT TO   
20110113100327.000|20110113100328.000|CC1|PEACEABLY ASSEMBLE.             
20110113100328.000|20110113100332.000|CC1|TWO DAYS LATER SHE AND HER      
20110113100332.000|20110113100334.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS HAD THEIR GOD      
20110113100334.000|20110113100336.000|CC1|GIVEN RIGHTS VIOLENTLY TAKEN    
20110113100336.000|20110113100338.000|CC1|FROM THEM.                      
20110113100338.000|20110113100341.000|CC1|IN THE MIDST OF OUR NATIONAL    
20110113100341.000|20110113100345.000|CC1|GRIEF, THE DESIRE TO MAKE SENSE 
20110113100345.000|20110113100348.000|CC1|OF THE SENSELESS IS PROFOUND.   
20110113100348.000|20110113100351.000|CC1|WE ERR IF WE ATTEMPT TO         
20110113100351.000|20110113100353.000|CC1|RATIONALIZE WHAT IS WHOLLY      
20110113100353.000|20110113100356.000|CC1|IRRATIONAL AND TO UNDERSTAND    
20110113100356.000|20110113100400.000|CC1|WHAT CANNOT BE UNDERSTOOD.      
20110113100400.000|20110113100403.000|CC1|THE APOSTLE PAUL WRITES, NOW WE 
20110113100403.000|20110113100407.000|CC1|SEE BUT A POOR REFLECTION AS IN 
20110113100407.000|20110113100410.000|CC1|A MIRROR.                       
20110113100410.000|20110113100412.000|CC1|INSTEAD, LET US ALL STAND WITH  
20110113100412.000|20110113100414.000|CC1|THE GENTLELADY FROM ARIZONA IN  
20110113100414.000|20110113100418.000|CC1|HER TIME OF TRIAL AND DEFENSE   
20110113100418.000|20110113100420.000|CC1|OF THE CONSTITUTION WHICH SHE   
20110113100420.000|20110113100423.000|CC1|IS STRIVING TO UPHOLD.          
20110113100423.000|20110113100425.000|CC1|LET US STAND WITH OUR           
20110113100425.000|20110113100428.000|CC1|9-YEAR-OLD DAUGHTERS WHO ARE    
20110113100428.000|20110113100429.000|CC1|FOSTERING A BUDDING INTEREST IN 
20110113100429.000|20110113100432.000|CC1|OUR REPRESENTATIVE DEMOCRACY.   
20110113100432.000|20110113100436.000|CC1|LET US STAND WITH OUR 76 AND    
20110113100436.000|20110113100438.000|CC1|79-YEAR-OLD MOTHERS AND FATHERS 
20110113100438.000|20110113100440.000|CC1|WHO SEEK ONLY TO FORGE A        
20110113100440.000|20110113100442.000|CC1|RELATIONSHIP WITH THEIR ELECTED 
20110113100442.000|20110113100443.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVES.                
20110113100443.000|20110113100446.000|CC1|AND TO IMPART A WISDOM THAT     
20110113100446.000|20110113100448.000|CC1|COMES WITH LONG LIFE AS A       
20110113100448.000|20110113100451.000|CC1|CITIZEN OF THIS COUNTRY.        
20110113100451.000|20110113100454.000|CC1|AND LET US STAND WITH OUR       
20110113100454.000|20110113100457.000|CC1|SERVANT LEADERS OF ALL AGES AND 
20110113100457.000|20110113100502.000|CC1|PARTIES AND WHO SPEND EVERY DAY 
20110113100502.000|20110113100504.000|CC1|IN A PASSIONATE EFFORT TO       
20110113100504.000|20110113100506.000|CC1|BETTER A GREAT NATION AND       
20110113100506.000|20110113100508.000|CC1|BEAUTIFUL IDEAL.                
20110113100508.000|20110113100512.000|CC1|WE DO THEM HONOR IF WE CONTINUE 
20110113100512.000|20110113100514.000|CC1|NOT WITH IDLE SPECULATION BUT   
20110113100514.000|20110113100518.000|CC1|WITH A RENEWED COMMITMENT TO    
20110113100518.000|20110113100520.000|CC1|EXERCISE THE RIGHT OF LIBERTY   
20110113100520.000|20110113100522.000|CC1|AND FREEDOM.                    
20110113100522.000|20110113100524.000|CC1|WE BEGIN THE LONG ROAD TO       
20110113100524.000|20110113100528.000|CC1|HEALING BY FERVENTLY PRAYING    
20110113100528.000|20110113100530.000|CC1|FOR PEACE IN OUR WORLD, PEACE   
20110113100530.000|20110113100534.000|CC1|IN OUR COUNTRY, AND PEACE IN    
20110113100534.000|20110113100538.000|CC1|OUR HEART.                      
20110113100538.000|20110113100540.000|CC1|GOD BLESS THE VICTIMS OF        
20110113100540.000|20110113100542.000|CC1|SATURDAY'S VIOLENCE AND THEIR

20110113100608.000|20110113100611.000|CC1|TO THE GENTLELADY FROM GUAM.    
20110113100611.000|20110113100614.000|CC1|MISS BORE CALO: --              
20110113100614.000|20110113100618.000|CC1|MS. BORDALLO: MR. SPEAKER, I    
20110113100618.000|20110113100620.000|CC1|RISE IN SUPPORT OF THE          
20110113100620.000|20110113100623.000|CC1|RESOLUTION TODAY AND TO HONOR

20110113100629.000|20110113100630.000|CC1|GABBY GIFFORDS, WHO IS

20110113100634.000|20110113100636.000|CC1|VICTIMS OF SATURDAY'S TRAGIC

20110113100639.000|20110113100642.000|CC1|GABBY ZIMMERMAN, FEDERAL JUDGE  
20110113100642.000|20110113100646.000|CC1|JOHN ROLL, DOROTHY MORRIS,      
20110113100646.000|20110113100647.000|CC1|PHYLLIS SCHNECK, DORWAN

20110113100654.000|20110113100656.000|CC1|SATURDAY IN SUCH A SENSELESS    
20110113100656.000|20110113100659.000|CC1|ACT OF VIOLENCE THAT WAS A      
20110113100659.000|20110113100700.000|CC1|DIRECT ATTACK ON OUR DEMOCRACY. 
20110113100700.000|20110113100705.000|CC1|.                               
20110113100705.000|20110113100706.000|CC1|BEING THE EXTRAORDINARY PUBLIC  
20110113100706.000|20110113100709.000|CC1|SERVANT SHE IS, GABBY HAD TAKEN 
20110113100709.000|20110113100711.000|CC1|HER FIRST OPPORTUNITY IN THE    
20110113100711.000|20110113100713.000|CC1|112TH CONGRESS TO ORGANIZE AN   
20110113100713.000|20110113100715.000|CC1|EVENT, TO LEARN OF HER          
20110113100715.000|20110113100717.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS' CONCERNS AND THEIR
20110113100717.000|20110113100718.000|CC1|HOPES.                          
20110113100718.000|20110113100720.000|CC1|THE VICTIMS HAD ALL PEACEFULLY  
20110113100720.000|20110113100722.000|CC1|GATHERED AT A LOCAL MALL TO     
20110113100722.000|20110113100725.000|CC1|PARTICIPATE IN THE DEMOCRATIC   
20110113100725.000|20110113100726.000|CC1|PROCESS.                        
20110113100726.000|20110113100728.000|CC1|THE BASIC EXERCISE OF DEMOCRACY 
20110113100728.000|20110113100731.000|CC1|WAS INTERRUPTED BY A DISTURBED  
20110113100731.000|20110113100734.000|CC1|INDIVIDUAL BENT ON ANGER AT THE 
20110113100734.000|20110113100735.000|CC1|SYSTEM.                         
20110113100735.000|20110113100737.000|CC1|THIS NEEDLESS AND DESPICABLE ACT
20110113100737.000|20110113100740.000|CC1|OF VIOLENCE HAS NO PLACE IN OUR 
20110113100740.000|20110113100741.000|CC1|SOCIETY AND SHOULD GIVE US ALL  
20110113100741.000|20110113100744.000|CC1|CAUSE TO REFLECT ON THE LEVEL OF
20110113100744.000|20110113100747.000|CC1|POLITICAL DISCOURSE IN THIS     
20110113100747.000|20110113100748.000|CC1|COUNTRY.                        
20110113100748.000|20110113100749.000|CC1|BUT WHILE WE RECOGNIZE THE      
20110113100749.000|20110113100751.000|CC1|TRAGEDY THAT OCCURRED AND PRAY

20110113100934.000|20110113100935.000|CC1|INNOCENT INDIVIDUALS AND A

20110113100940.000|20110113100941.000|CC1|INCLUDING OUR OWN GABBY.        
20110113100941.000|20110113100942.000|CC1|FOR THOSE WHO LOST THEIR LIVES  
20110113100942.000|20110113100946.000|CC1|WE KNOW THAT THE LIST IS        
20110113100946.000|20110113100947.000|CC1|LAMENTABLY LONG, THE HONORABLE  
20110113100947.000|20110113100948.000|CC1|JOHN ROLL, A FEDERAL JUDGE WHO  
20110113100948.000|20110113100950.000|CC1|WENT BY JUST TO SAY HI TO HIS   
20110113100950.000|20110113100952.000|CC1|FRIEND GABBY, AND CHRISTINA     
20110113100952.000|20110113100954.000|CC1|TAYLOR GREEN, A 9-YEAR-OLD GIRL 
20110113100954.000|20110113100955.000|CC1|WHO HAD JUST BEEN CHOSEN TO     
20110113100955.000|20110113100957.000|CC1|SERVE IN HER SCHOOL'S STUDENT   
20110113100957.000|20110113101000.000|CC1|COUNCIL AND WHO WAS TAKEN TO    
20110113101000.000|20110113101002.000|CC1|GABBY'S CONGRESS ON YOUR CORNER 
20110113101002.000|20110113101004.000|CC1|EVENT BY A FAMILY FRIEND WHO    
20110113101004.000|20110113101006.000|CC1|WANTED TO GET HER INTERESTED IN 
20110113101006.000|20110113101007.000|CC1|PUBLIC AFFAIRS.                 
20110113101007.000|20110113101010.000|CC1|AND GAVE ZIMMERMAN, A MEMBER OF 
20110113101010.000|20110113101013.000|CC1|GABBY'S LOYAL STAFF WHO HAD AN  
20110113101013.000|20110113101014.000|CC1|ENORMOUS HEART AND WAS RECENTLY 
20110113101014.000|20110113101015.000|CC1|ENGAGED TO BE MARRIED.          
20110113101015.000|20110113101017.000|CC1|IT IS DIFFICULT TO MAKE SENSE OF
20110113101017.000|20110113101019.000|CC1|THIS TRAGEDY BUT ALL AMERICANS  
20110113101019.000|20110113101020.000|CC1|STAND WITH GABBY, WITH HER      
20110113101020.000|20110113101021.000|CC1|FAMILY AND THE FAMILIES OF ALL  
20110113101021.000|20110113101024.000|CC1|THE VICTIMS THROUGHOUT THIS     
20110113101024.000|20110113101025.000|CC1|PAINFUL TIME.                   
20110113101025.000|20110113101027.000|CC1|MANY OF US COUNT GABBY NOT JUST 
20110113101027.000|20110113101029.000|CC1|AS A COLLEAGUE BUT AS A FRIEND. 
20110113101029.000|20110113101031.000|CC1|I HAD THE PRIVILEGE OF GETTING  
20110113101031.000|20110113101033.000|CC1|TO KNOW GABBY AS A -- GABBY AS A
20110113101033.000|20110113101035.000|CC1|MEMBER OF OUR FOREIGN AFFAIRS   
20110113101035.000|20110113101036.000|CC1|COMMITTEE.                      
20110113101036.000|20110113101037.000|CC1|SHE HAS ALWAYS DEMONSTRATED A   
20110113101037.000|20110113101038.000|CC1|STRONG COMMITMENT TO SERVING HER
20110113101038.000|20110113101039.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS, THE MEN AND WOMEN 
20110113101039.000|20110113101041.000|CC1|OF OUR ARMED FORCES AND OUR     
20110113101041.000|20110113101042.000|CC1|NATION.                         
20110113101042.000|20110113101044.000|CC1|AND THAT IS EXACTLY WHAT WE MUST
20110113101044.000|20110113101047.000|CC1|DO, WE MUST NOT WAIVER IN OUR   
20110113101047.000|20110113101050.000|CC1|DUTIES -- WAVER IN OUR DUTIES TO
20110113101050.000|20110113101051.000|CC1|SERVE THOSE WHO WE ARE PROUDLY  
20110113101051.000|20110113101054.000|CC1|AND YET HUMBLY ASKED TO SERVE.  
20110113101054.000|20110113101056.000|CC1|OUR REPUBLIC WAS FOUNDED ON THE 
20110113101056.000|20110113101057.000|CC1|PREMISE THAT THE PEOPLE HAVE THE
20110113101057.000|20110113101100.000|CC1|RIGHT AND THE DUTY TO PETITION  
20110113101100.000|20110113101101.000|CC1|THEIR REPRESENTATIVES AND TO    
20110113101101.000|20110113101103.000|CC1|EXPRESS THEIR VIEWS.            
20110113101103.000|20110113101105.000|CC1|AND GABBY TRULY EMBODIES THAT   
20110113101105.000|20110113101106.000|CC1|PRINCIPLE.                      
20110113101106.000|20110113101107.000|CC1|SHE HAS ALWAYS BEEN ACCESSIBLE, 
20110113101107.000|20110113101109.000|CC1|SHE'S ALWAYS BEEN EAGER TO      
20110113101109.000|20110113101111.000|CC1|LISTEN TO HER CONSTITUENTS.     
20110113101111.000|20110113101113.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVES LIKE GABBY ARE  
20110113101113.000|20110113101114.000|CC1|WHAT HAVE MADE AMERICA AN       
20110113101114.000|20110113101116.000|CC1|EXAMPLE OF FREEDOM AND DEMOCRACY
20110113101116.000|20110113101118.000|CC1|THE WORLD OVER.                 
20110113101118.000|20110113101120.000|CC1|IT IS TRULY REPREHENSIBLE TO    
20110113101120.000|20110113101121.000|CC1|THINK THAT THESE NOBLE          
20110113101121.000|20110113101123.000|CC1|INTENTIONS WERE EXPLOITED TO    
20110113101123.000|20110113101126.000|CC1|CARRY OUT SUCH A TERRIBLE       
20110113101126.000|20110113101127.000|CC1|TRAGEDY.                        
20110113101127.000|20110113101128.000|CC1|TO QUOTE DR. MARTIN LUTHER KING,
20110113101128.000|20110113101130.000|CC1|WE MUST DISAGREE WITHOUT        
20110113101130.000|20110113101132.000|CC1|BECOMING VIOLENTLY DISAGREEABLE.

20110113101209.000|20110113101210.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS FIRSTHAND.         
20110113101210.000|20110113101212.000|CC1|I'VE HAD THE PLEASURE TO WORK   
20110113101212.000|20110113101214.000|CC1|WITH HER AS WE PROMOTED EFFORTS 
20110113101214.000|20110113101216.000|CC1|TO RESTORE OUR NATION'S         
20110113101216.000|20110113101217.000|CC1|COMPETITIVENESS AND SPECIFICALLY
20110113101217.000|20110113101220.000|CC1|TO HELP CREATE CLEAN ENERGY     
20110113101220.000|20110113101221.000|CC1|JOBS.                           
20110113101221.000|20110113101223.000|CC1|GABBY IS SMART, COURAGEOUS,     
20110113101223.000|20110113101225.000|CC1|DISCIPLINED AND EFFECTIVE.      
20110113101225.000|20110113101226.000|CC1|MS. MATSUI: AND AS WE HAVE ALL  
20110113101226.000|20110113101229.000|CC1|SEEN OVER THE LAST FEW DAYS, HER
20110113101229.000|20110113101232.000|CC1|STRENGTH IS UNWAVENERING.       
20110113101232.000|20110113101234.000|CC1|LAST SATURDAY GABBY ORGANIZED AN
20110113101234.000|20110113101236.000|CC1|EVENT TO TALK TO HER            
20110113101236.000|20110113101238.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS ABOUT THEIR        
20110113101238.000|20110113101239.000|CC1|PRIORITIES, ABOUT THEIR CONCERNS
20110113101239.000|20110113101241.000|CC1|AND THEIR HOPES.                
20110113101241.000|20110113101244.000|CC1|IT IS HEARTBREAKING AND A       
20110113101244.000|20110113101245.000|CC1|TRAGEDY THAT SIX INNOCENT PEOPLE
20110113101245.000|20110113101249.000|CC1|LOST THEIR LIVES AND AN         
20110113101249.000|20110113101250.000|CC1|ADDITIONAL 13 HAVE BEEN         
20110113101250.000|20110113101251.000|CC1|CRITICALLY WOUNDED, ALL WHILE   
20110113101251.000|20110113101254.000|CC1|TRYING TO PARTICIPATE IN AND    
20110113101254.000|20110113101256.000|CC1|STRENGTHEN OUR DEMOCRACY.       
20110113101256.000|20110113101257.000|CC1|WE ARE ALL NOW REFLECTING ON    
20110113101257.000|20110113101259.000|CC1|WHAT BROUGHT OUR COUNTRY TO THIS
20110113101259.000|20110113101302.000|CC1|POINT AND HOW TO MOVE FORWARD.  
20110113101302.000|20110113101305.000|CC1|AS EVERYONE IN THIS CHAMBER CAN 
20110113101305.000|20110113101307.000|CC1|ATTEST, BEING A REPRESENTATIVE  
20110113101307.000|20110113101309.000|CC1|IS MORE THAN A JOB TITLE.       
20110113101309.000|20110113101313.000|CC1|IT IS WHAT WE DO AND IT IS WHO  
20110113101313.000|20110113101314.000|CC1|WE ARE.                         
20110113101314.000|20110113101316.000|CC1|WE MEET WITH OUR CONSTITUENTS,  
20110113101316.000|20110113101318.000|CC1|WE LISTEN TO THEM, WE ADVOCATE  
20110113101318.000|20110113101321.000|CC1|FOR THEIR BEST INTERESTS.       
20110113101321.000|20110113101322.000|CC1|MR. SPEAKER, I'D ALSO LIKE TO   
20110113101322.000|20110113101324.000|CC1|TAKE A MOMENT TO HONOR THE OTHER
20110113101324.000|20110113101327.000|CC1|VICTIMS OF THIS HORRIFIC        
20110113101327.000|20110113101328.000|CC1|TRAGEDY.                        
20110113101328.000|20110113101329.000|CC1|9-YEAR-OLD BEAUTIFUL CHRISTINA  
20110113101329.000|20110113101331.000|CC1|TAYLOR GREEN, RECENTLY ELECTED  
20110113101331.000|20110113101333.000|CC1|TO STUDENT COUNCIL.             
20110113101333.000|20110113101336.000|CC1|GAVE ZIMMERMAN, A DEDICATED     
20110113101336.000|20110113101339.000|CC1|STAFFER WHO WAS JUST ON THE CUSP
20110113101339.000|20110113101341.000|CC1|OF HIS OWN LIFE, RECENTLY       
20110113101341.000|20110113101342.000|CC1|ENGAGED.                        
20110113101342.000|20110113101344.000|CC1|JUDGE JOHN ROLL, HIGHLY         
20110113101344.000|20110113101347.000|CC1|RESPECTED JUDGE WHO CAME BY TO  
20110113101347.000|20110113101348.000|CC1|THANK GABBY FOR HER SUPPORT AT  
20110113101348.000|20110113101350.000|CC1|THE JUDICIARY.                  
20110113101350.000|20110113101351.000|CC1|PHYLLIS SCHNECK WHO WAS A       
20110113101351.000|20110113101355.000|CC1|TIRELESS VOLUNTEER AT HER LOCAL 
20110113101355.000|20110113101356.000|CC1|CHURCH.                         
20110113101356.000|20110113101358.000|CC1|DORWIN STODDARD WHO SHIELDED HIS
20110113101358.000|20110113101400.000|CC1|DEAR WIFE.                      
20110113101400.000|20110113101403.000|CC1|AND DOROTHY MORRIS WHO WAS      
20110113101403.000|20110113101405.000|CC1|MARRIED TO HER HUSBAND A LONG   
20110113101405.000|20110113101408.000|CC1|TIME, WHO WAS THERE BUT WHO     
20110113101408.000|20110113101409.000|CC1|SURVIVED.                       
20110113101409.000|20110113101411.000|CC1|MY THOUGHTS AND PRAYERS REMAIN  
20110113101411.000|20110113101413.000|CC1|WITH GABBY AND WITH EACH VICTIM 
20110113101413.000|20110113101415.000|CC1|AND THEIR FAMILIES.             
20110113101415.000|20110113101417.000|CC1|AND I YIELD BACK THE BALANCE OF 
20110113101417.000|20110113101419.000|CC1|MY TIME.                        
20110113101419.000|20110113101420.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: THE    
20110113101420.000|20110113101421.000|CC1|GENTLELADY YIELDS BACK.         
20110113101421.000|20110113101422.000|CC1|THE GENTLEMAN FROM VIRGINIA.    
20110113101422.000|20110113101423.000|CC1|MR. CANTOR: MADAM SPEAKER, I    
20110113101423.000|20110113101424.000|CC1|YIELD TO THE GENTLEMAN FROM     
20110113101424.000|20110113101425.000|CC1|KENTUCKY, MR. GUTHRIE, FOR TWO

20110113101428.000|20110113101429.000|CC1|RECOGNIZED FOR TWO MINUTES.     
20110113101429.000|20110113101430.000|CC1|MR. GUTHRIE: THANK YOU, MADAM   
20110113101430.000|20110113101431.000|CC1|SPEAKER.                        
20110113101431.000|20110113101432.000|CC1|I APPRECIATE THE OPPORTUNITY TO 
20110113101432.000|20110113101433.000|CC1|BE HERE, TO OFFER MY THOUGHTS   
20110113101433.000|20110113101434.000|CC1|AND PRAYERS FOR GABBY, OUR      
20110113101434.000|20110113101435.000|CC1|COLLEAGUE.                      
20110113101435.000|20110113101436.000|CC1|LIKE ALL OF US HERE, ANY        
20110113101436.000|20110113101438.000|CC1|INTERACTION I'VE HAD WITH HER   
20110113101438.000|20110113101439.000|CC1|WAS ALWAYS PLEASANT AND         
20110113101439.000|20110113101441.000|CC1|MEMORABLE AND I LOOK FORWARD TO 
20110113101441.000|20110113101443.000|CC1|HER RETURNING, PRAY FOR HER     
20110113101443.000|20110113101444.000|CC1|RETURN, PRAY FOR HER STAFF AND  
20110113101444.000|20110113101445.000|CC1|PRAY FOR THE OTHER VICTIMS.     
20110113101445.000|20110113101447.000|CC1|I WANT TO HOLD                  
20110113101447.000|20110113101448.000|CC1|MR. UPTON: ONE VICTIM THIS      
20110113101448.000|20110113101449.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20110113101449.000|20110113101450.000|CC1|I DIDN'T KNOW DORWIN STODDARD   
20110113101450.000|20110113101451.000|CC1|BUT THROUGH A CLOSE NETWORK OF  
20110113101451.000|20110113101452.000|CC1|FRIENDS I'VE HAD THE OPPORTUNITY
20110113101452.000|20110113101454.000|CC1|TO LEARN A LITTLE BIT ABOUT     
20110113101454.000|20110113101456.000|CC1|DORWIN STODDARD AND HE'S THE ONE
20110113101456.000|20110113101458.000|CC1|THAT SHIELDED HIS WIFE WITH HIS 
20110113101458.000|20110113101500.000|CC1|OWN BODY, SAVING HER LIFE BUT   
20110113101500.000|20110113101501.000|CC1|LOSING HIS OWN.                 
20110113101501.000|20110113101503.000|CC1|AND HE AND HIS WIFE WERE HAVING 
20110113101503.000|20110113101504.000|CC1|BREAKFAST AND DECIDED THEY      
20110113101504.000|20110113101505.000|CC1|WANTED TO GO TO THE CONGRESS ON 
20110113101505.000|20110113101507.000|CC1|THE CORNER TO GIVE GABBY        
20110113101507.000|20110113101508.000|CC1|ENCOURAGEMENT FOR THE NEW YEAR  
20110113101508.000|20110113101510.000|CC1|AND THE NEW YEAR IN CONGRESS, TO
20110113101510.000|20110113101511.000|CC1|ENCOURAGE HER.                  
20110113101511.000|20110113101513.000|CC1|HE LOVED THE BIBLE, HE LOVED THE
20110113101513.000|20110113101515.000|CC1|SCRIPTURES IN ITS SIMPLEST AND  
20110113101515.000|20110113101517.000|CC1|PUREST FORM AND WANTED TO LIVE  
20110113101517.000|20110113101519.000|CC1|THEM WHICH IS EVIDENCE IN HIS   
20110113101519.000|20110113101520.000|CC1|LIFE.                           
20110113101520.000|20110113101521.000|CC1|HE'S VERY INVOLVED IN CHURCH    
20110113101521.000|20110113101522.000|CC1|WORK.                           
20110113101522.000|20110113101523.000|CC1|HE RAN THE BENEVOLENCE PROGRAM  
20110113101523.000|20110113101524.000|CC1|WHICH LIVED UP TO CHRIST'S      
20110113101524.000|20110113101525.000|CC1|CHALLENGE TO FEED THE HUNGRY AND
20110113101525.000|20110113101526.000|CC1|CLOTHE THE POOR.                
20110113101526.000|20110113101529.000|CC1|AND WE KNOW HE INTERNALIZED THE 
20110113101529.000|20110113101531.000|CC1|SCRIPTURE BECAUSE OF HIS LAST   
20110113101531.000|20110113101532.000|CC1|ACT.                            
20110113101532.000|20110113101533.000|CC1|OF HIS LAST ACT.                
20110113101533.000|20110113101534.000|CC1|AND I DON'T KNOW THIS, BUT I    
20110113101534.000|20110113101535.000|CC1|THINK I CAN SAY WITHOUT FEAR OF 
20110113101535.000|20110113101537.000|CC1|CONTRADICTION THERE WERE MANY   
20110113101537.000|20110113101538.000|CC1|TIMES HE'S PROBABLY SITTING IN  
20110113101538.000|20110113101540.000|CC1|CHURCH WAITING FOR THE MINISTER 
20110113101540.000|20110113101542.000|CC1|TO DELIVER A SERMON ON MARRIAGE 
20110113101542.000|20110113101546.000|CC1|AND I'M SURE THE TEXT WAS ONE   
20110113101546.000|20110113101549.000|CC1|WHEN IT SAID, HUSBAND, LOVE YOUR
20110113101549.000|20110113101550.000|CC1|WIFES AS CHRIST LOVED THE CHURCH
20110113101550.000|20110113101554.000|CC1|AND GAVE HIMSELF UP FOR HER.    
20110113101554.000|20110113101557.000|CC1|WHAT LOVE HE HAD FOR HIS WIFE   
20110113101557.000|20110113101600.000|CC1|AND WHAT FAITH HE HAD IN GOD.   
20110113101600.000|20110113101602.000|CC1|THRULTE HIS LIFE, HE ASPIRED TO 
20110113101602.000|20110113101603.000|CC1|-- THROUGHOUT HIS LIFE HE       
20110113101603.000|20110113101604.000|CC1|ASPIRED TO DO GOOD.             
20110113101604.000|20110113101606.000|CC1|THROUGH HIS LIFE, LET US ALL    
20110113101606.000|20110113101607.000|CC1|INSPIRE TO DO OUR BEST.         
20110113101607.000|20110113101609.000|CC1|I YIELD BACK.                   
20110113101609.000|20110113101610.000|CC1|THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE: THE    
20110113101610.000|20110113101611.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN YIELDS BACK.

20110113101612.000|20110113101613.000|CC1|MR. PASTOR: MADAM SPEAKER, I    
20110113101613.000|20110113101614.000|CC1|YIELD TWO MINUTES TO THE        
20110113101614.000|20110113101615.000|CC1|GENTLEMAN FROM TEXAS.

20110113101620.000|20110113101621.000|CC1|MR. GREEN: MADAM SPEAKER, TODAY 
20110113101621.000|20110113101625.000|CC1|WE ARE ONE AND WE ARE RESOLUTE. 
20110113101625.000|20110113101627.000|CC1|WE ARE ONE BECAUSE WE UNDERSTAND
20110113101627.000|20110113101629.000|CC1|THAT THERE REALLY IS BUT ONE    
20110113101629.000|20110113101632.000|CC1|RACE AND THAT IS THE HUMAN RACE.
20110113101632.000|20110113101634.000|CC1|WE ARE ONE BECAUSE AS DR. KING  
20110113101634.000|20110113101636.000|CC1|PUT IT, ALL OF HUMANITY WAS     
20110113101636.000|20110113101639.000|CC1|CREATED BY ONE COMMON CREATOR TO
20110113101639.000|20110113101641.000|CC1|LIVE IN HARMONY FROM A BASE     
20110113101641.000|20110113101644.000|CC1|BLACK TO A TREBLE WHITE, WE ARE 
20110113101644.000|20110113101646.000|CC1|ONE AND WE ARE RESOLUTE.        
20110113101646.000|20110113101648.000|CC1|WE ARE RESOLUTE IN OUR BELIEF   
20110113101648.000|20110113101651.000|CC1|THAT ONE DAY OUR FRIEND, OUR    
20110113101651.000|20110113101653.000|CC1|SISTER WILL RETURN TO THE FLOOR 
20110113101653.000|20110113101654.000|CC1|OF THIS CONGRESS, TO THIS HALL, 
20110113101654.000|20110113101656.000|CC1|AND SHE WILL STAND AT THIS      
20110113101656.000|20110113101659.000|CC1|PODIUM AND SHE WILL BE WELCOMED 
20110113101659.000|20110113101700.000|CC1|BY HER COLLEAGUES AS SHE RETURNS
20110113101700.000|20110113101703.000|CC1|AND TAKES A RIGHTFUL PLACE IN   
20110113101703.000|20110113101704.000|CC1|THE HALLS OF THE CONGRESS OF THE
20110113101704.000|20110113101706.000|CC1|UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.       
20110113101706.000|20110113101707.000|CC1|WE ARE ONE AND WE ARE RESOLUTE  
20110113101707.000|20110113101709.000|CC1|BECAUSE WE BELIEVE THAT AN      
20110113101709.000|20110113101711.000|CC1|INNOCENT BABY WAS TAKEN FROM US 
20110113101711.000|20110113101714.000|CC1|AND THAT INNOCENT BABY, THOUGH  
20110113101714.000|20110113101716.000|CC1|SHE IS NOT WITH US IN THE       
20110113101716.000|20110113101717.000|CC1|PHYSICAL, SHE WILL FOREVER BE   
20110113101717.000|20110113101719.000|CC1|WITH US IN THE SPIRITUAL AS LONG
20110113101719.000|20110113101722.000|CC1|AS WE REMEMBER WHO SHE WAS AND  
20110113101722.000|20110113101724.000|CC1|NEVER FORGET THAT WE CANNOT     
20110113101724.000|20110113101726.000|CC1|ALLOW THE INNOCENT TO BE STOLEN 
20110113101726.000|20110113101729.000|CC1|FROM US WITHOUT OUR TAKING THE  
20110113101729.000|20110113101730.000|CC1|TIME TO PAUSE AND BE GRATEFUL   
20110113101730.000|20110113101732.000|CC1|FOR THE TIME THAT WE HAD WITH   
20110113101732.000|20110113101733.000|CC1|THE INNOCENT.                   
20110113101733.000|20110113101736.000|CC1|WE ARE ONE AND WE ARE RESOLUTE. 
20110113101736.000|20110113101737.000|CC1|BUT WE MUST ALSO BE RESOLUTE IN 
20110113101737.000|20110113101739.000|CC1|A BASIC PREMISE THAT DR. KING   
20110113101739.000|20110113101741.000|CC1|CALLED TO OUR ATTENTION AND THAT
20110113101741.000|20110113101744.000|CC1|IS THAT WE MUST LEARN TO LIVE   
20110113101744.000|20110113101747.000|CC1|TOGETHER AS BROTHERS AND SISTERS
20110113101747.000|20110113101750.000|CC1|OR WE WILL PERISH TOGETHER AS   
20110113101750.000|20110113101751.000|CC1|FOOLS.                          
20110113101751.000|20110113101752.000|CC1|WE ARE ONE AND WE ARE RESOLUTE.

20110113101810.000|20110113101811.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE GABRIELLE        
20110113101811.000|20110113101812.000|CC1|GIFFORDS, ONE OF MANY VICTIMS OF
20110113101812.000|20110113101815.000|CC1|A VERY SENSELESS ACT OF VIOLENCE
20110113101815.000|20110113101816.000|CC1|THIS PAST SATURDAY.             
20110113101816.000|20110113101818.000|CC1|I'VE HAD THE PLEASURE OF KNOWING
20110113101818.000|20110113101820.000|CC1|GABBY AND HER HUSBAND MARK,     
20110113101820.000|20110113101821.000|CC1|ASTRONAUT MARK KELLY, FOR       
20110113101821.000|20110113101823.000|CC1|SEVERAL YEARS, EVEN BEFORE      
20110113101823.000|20110113101825.000|CC1|EITHER OF US SET FOOT IN THIS   
20110113101825.000|20110113101826.000|CC1|CHAMBER.                        
20110113101826.000|20110113101827.000|CC1|IN MY DISTRICT OFFICE THERE'S A 
20110113101827.000|20110113101829.000|CC1|PHOTO OF GABBY, MYSELF AND      
20110113101829.000|20110113101831.000|CC1|OTHERS WHO WERE PART OF A       
20110113101831.000|20110113101832.000|CC1|FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM WHICH WAS    
20110113101832.000|20110113101833.000|CC1|CREATED TO EXPLORE THE          
20110113101833.000|20110113101834.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITIES OF PUBLIC      
20110113101834.000|20110113101836.000|CC1|LEADERSHIP, ADVANCED THOUGHTFUL,
20110113101836.000|20110113101838.000|CC1|CIVIL, BIPARTISAN DIALOGUE AND  
20110113101838.000|20110113101841.000|CC1|HELP AMERICA'S LEADERS ACHIEVE  
20110113101841.000|20110113101843.000|CC1|THEIR FULL POTENTIAL.           
20110113101843.000|20110113101844.000|CC1|GABBY IS SO MUCH ABOUT ALL OF   
20110113101844.000|20110113101846.000|CC1|THESE IDEALS.                   
20110113101846.000|20110113101848.000|CC1|I FOUND MYSELF LOOKING AT THIS  
20110113101848.000|20110113101849.000|CC1|PHOTO OVER THE LAST FEW DAYS    
20110113101849.000|20110113101851.000|CC1|QUITE OFTEN AND I COULDN'T HELP 
20110113101851.000|20110113101852.000|CC1|BUT THINK THAT ALL OF OUR       
20110113101852.000|20110113101854.000|CC1|COMMUNITIES COULD USE A FEW MORE
20110113101854.000|20110113101855.000|CC1|INDIVIDUALS LIKE GABBY WHOSE    
20110113101855.000|20110113101857.000|CC1|BRIGHT SMILE AND KIND HEART HAVE
20110113101857.000|20110113101900.000|CC1|COME TO DEFINE HER TENURE HERE  
20110113101900.000|20110113101901.000|CC1|IN CONGRESS.                    
20110113101901.000|20110113101902.000|CC1|FOR MANY OF US HERE TODAY, THE  
20110113101902.000|20110113101904.000|CC1|NEWS OF THE TRAGEDY WAS GUT     
20110113101904.000|20110113101905.000|CC1|WRENCHING.                      
20110113101905.000|20110113101906.000|CC1|IT'S HARD TO BELIEVE THAT JUST A
20110113101906.000|20110113101907.000|CC1|FEW DAYS BEFORE THIS SENSELESS  
20110113101907.000|20110113101909.000|CC1|ATTACK, MY FAMILY AND I WERE OUT
20110113101909.000|20110113101912.000|CC1|VISITING AT THE AIR AND SPACE   
20110113101912.000|20110113101915.000|CC1|MUSEUM AT DULLES AIRPORT WHEN WE
20110113101915.000|20110113101917.000|CC1|HEARD SOMEONE SHUT OUT MY NAME. 
20110113101917.000|20110113101919.000|CC1|IT WAS GABBY'S HUSBAND, MARK,   
20110113101919.000|20110113101920.000|CC1|WITH GABBY AND HER PARENTS IN   
20110113101920.000|20110113101923.000|CC1|TOE AND WE SPENT THE NEXT       
20110113101923.000|20110113101926.000|CC1|SEVERAL MINUTES TALKING AND AS  
20110113101926.000|20110113101927.000|CC1|FRIENDS OFTEN DO RECALLING SOME 
20110113101927.000|20110113101929.000|CC1|OF OUR GOOD MEMORIES SUCH AS    
20110113101929.000|20110113101931.000|CC1|WHEN I JOINED GABBY WITH TWO OF 
20110113101931.000|20110113101932.000|CC1|MY DAUGHTERS AT ONE OF MARK'S   
20110113101932.000|20110113101934.000|CC1|SPACE SHUTTLE LAUNCHES IN       
20110113101934.000|20110113101935.000|CC1|FLORIDA.                        
20110113101935.000|20110113101936.000|CC1|OVER THE PAST FEW DAYS THERE
